intro: Clutia stuhlmannii, commonly known as the African clutia, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and clusters of small white or pink flowers. It produces small, round berries that are typically green when immature and turn red when mature. Clutia stuhlmannii is often used in traditional medicine and is also cultivated as an ornamental plant.
